name: Labyrinth: The Computer Game
overview: Based on the fantasy film of the same name, Labyrinth is the first adventure game created by Lucasfilm. It tasks the player with navigating a maze while solving puzzles and evading dangers. The player's goal is to find and defeat the main antagonist, Jareth, within 13 real-time hours. Unlike other adventure games of the period, Labyrinth does not feature a command-line interface. Instead, the player uses two scrolling "word wheel" menus on the screen to construct basic sentences.
